name: Public Event Space, Valparaíso, Chile
blurb: We are designing and rebuilding a derelict site into a public square and event place for Sitio Eriazo in Valparaiso, Chile.

name: re Brut: Brutalist Architecture Re-Imagined
blurb: We are architecture students from the University of Illinois at Chicago aspiring to build an indoor pavilion designed and built by us.

name: Three Two Workshop in Ghana
blurb: Three+Two represents a change of perception in earth construction giving expanded meaning to the contemporary African home.

name: Warka Water 3.2
blurb: Warka Water captures potable water from the air by collecting rain, harvesting fog and dew for rural communities in Ethiopia.

name: PLAYSCAPE | Learning Space in Koh Rong, Cambodia
blurb: A school playground, activity space and shelter for the children of Koh Touch; a village located on the Island of Koh Rong, Cambodia.

name: Brick Architecture - World's Tallest Skyscrapers
blurb: 100+ custom skyscrapers, towers & landmarks from around the world, made from plastic bricks.

name: SCALA. Architecture Playing Cards
blurb: A standard deck of poker cards which provides an overview of several buildings of interest in the XXI century.

name: microscape | Architectural Cityscape Models
blurb: microscape architectural models celebrate the sculptural beauty of cities in 1:5000 scale durable tiles that you can display anywhere

name: FELIX
blurb: A semi-permanent wooden playscape to be built this coming June on Governor's Island in partnership with FIGMENT NYC!

name: educational space for flourishing community garden
blurb: We need your help to construct a community and educational center for our beloved garden in Ontario, California

name: Help us complete 'The Flagship Education Centre'
blurb: Be part of the most sustainable building in New Zealand: help build ‘The Flagship’, Auckland's epic new community space made from waste

name: Building with Hemp // Construire en chanvre
blurb: We are making a building material out of hemp to build a better world.  //  Nous fabriquons un matériau de construction en chanvre.

name: Architectour: The ultimate guide for the urban explorer
blurb: A hardcover city guide with all the secret spots and amazing stories no one told you about.

name: Power Absorbent Landscapes
blurb: Landscape castings that visualize the voting power of one of our most sublime states and fund an independent art and research project.

name: CO-MACHINES : A BOOK OF MOBILE DISRUPTIVE ARCHITECTURE
blurb: A ~240-page book on public space interventions that manifest as urban machines by emerging designers and artists from around the world.

name: Cozy Log Cabin - Sauna~Sweet Sweat Lodge by Treeverb Stage
blurb: Cozy Log Cabin & Treeverb Studio/Stage needs a Sweet Sweat Lodge~Sauna~Steam Room, Jacuzzi, Shower, Sink &Toilet for the bands & guests

name: The La Anna Guesthouse: A Poconos Creative Retreat
blurb: The La Anna Guesthouse is a new creatives' retreat and artist-in-residence program located in a historic home in the Pocono Mountains.

name: Lost River Vacations
blurb: A Deaf owned, operated and built campground with unique small dwellings, each with customized design, in a variety of styles and sizes.

name: Quickstarter: Architecture Notebooks
blurb: Notebooks inspired by the greatest architects of all time.

name: Build The Biodome!
blurb: Support the construction of the Biodome! A year round tropical park, and sustainable technology research center.

name: We Adopted a Hotel.
blurb: Restoring a 150 Y/O Neglected Property Into a Zero Plastic/Zero Waste Hotel, Art Gallery & Restaurant.

name: The Notebooks and Drawings of Louis I. Kahn: A Facsimile
blurb: An exact copy of the architect’s long-unavailable 60-year-old book accompanied by a new, illustrated  Reader’s Guide.

name: American Farmhouse: Architectural Plans
blurb: A book with blueprints for a small house. Learn how to design and build your dreams with open-source house plans and illustrations.

name: The LMNL Tent System by Diamond Brand
blurb: The All-Weather, Snap-Together Glamping Tent

name: Architect Essentials
blurb: Sketchbooks designed by the architecture community.

name: How to Build an American Farmhouse: Extended Plans
blurb: Learn how to construct a traditional house with this open-source design, featuring architectural drawings.

name: Southern Farmhouse: The Blueprints
blurb: It's not really the Forrest Gump house, but it can be yours. Learn how to design --or build your dream home-- using these house plans.
